casebody.data:
Harvey D. KOHN, M.D.
v.
FIRSTHEALTH OF the CAROLINAS, INC. d/b/a Moore Regional Hospital. No. 282P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Norman B. Smith, Greensboro, for Kohn, Harvey D. (M.D.). Samuel O. Southern, Raleigh, for Firsthealth of the Carolinas, Inc., et al. William R. Forstner, Raleigh, for Firsthealth of the Carolinas, Inc., et al. Matthew N. Leerberg, Raleigh, for Firsthealth of the Carolinas, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of August 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
